name: tdavss_25kTrain_NoLSTM_bs6_lr5e-4
notes: Remove LSTM Layers in Lip Embidder, 25K training folders, Batch size 6, lr = 5e-4, freeze LipNet, Normalize input with 1350, Batch size = 8, Predict time samples directly.Mish Activation Function, 2 Second clips. 0.35 lr decay if no Val_loss Dec for 3epochs. TasNet with Resnet without LSTM Lipnet. Loss is Si-SNR
